ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, it starts earlier but I think 50+ is when it becomes most noticeable.   The person I was replying to said he was level 32.  You are at 46 (almost) so your
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, it starts earlier but I think 50+ is when it becomes most
noticeable. The person I was replying to said he was level 32. You
are at 46 (almost) so your bonus will be a lot more noticeable, but
still Sainy's Claw has a pretty inferior ratio even if it is fast. Most
who use it only place it in secondary hand for its AC.

Shada

-----Original Message-----
From: Christopher Sanders [mailto:christopher.sanders@...]
Sent: Monday, December 03, 2001 6:05 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Weapons


By higher, do you mean 50+, or is there significant bonuses in the mid
40's?

Now I've got a Symphonic Saber (11/23), and a Sarnak Skullsplitter
(12/26).
I've switched them between hands, and really don't see a whole lot of
difference, except the SS proc, which my will is insufficient
for...hehe.
Just to try it, I put Sainy's Claw (6/19) in primary, and Symphonic
Saber in
secondary, and it took roughly half again as long to kill stuff as with
the
Symphonic Saber and Sarnak Skullsplitter equipped (I judged by how far a
feared sabertooth tiger was able to run when there were little to no
resists
to chains or fear). Hardly scientific, I know, but I've been more
involved
with making the xp bar move, than anything else. :)

Atonal
2 blues from 46!
